</MembersIndexItem>

<ProgramListing>

<Link id="l00001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//==- ConstantHoisting.h - Prepare code for expensive constants --&#42;- C++ -&#42;-==//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Part of the LLVM Project, under the Apache License v2.0 with LLVM Exceptions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// See https://llvm.org/LICENSE.txt for license information.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 WITH LLVM-exception</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This pass identifies expensive constants to hoist and coalesces them to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// better prepare it for SelectionDAG-based code generation. This works around</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the limitations of the basic-block-at-a-time approach.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// First it scans all instructions for integer constants and calculates its</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// cost. If the constant can be folded into the instruction (the cost is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TCC&#95;Free) or the cost is just a simple operation (TCC&#95;BASIC), then we don&#39;t</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// consider it expensive and leave it alone. This is the default behavior and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the default implementation of getIntImmCostInst will always return TCC&#95;Free.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the cost is more than TCC&#95;BASIC, then the integer constant can&#39;t be folded</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// into the instruction and it might be beneficial to hoist the constant.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Similar constants are coalesced to reduce register pressure and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// materialization code.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// When a constant is hoisted, it is also hidden behind a bitcast to force it to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// be live-out of the basic block. Otherwise the constant would be just</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// duplicated and each basic block would have its own copy in the SelectionDAG.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The SelectionDAG recognizes such constants as opaque and doesn&#39;t perform</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// certain transformations on them, which would create a new expensive constant.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This optimization is only applied to integer constants in instructions and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// simple (this means not nested) constant cast expressions. For example:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %0 = load i64&#42; inttoptr (i64 big&#95;constant to i64&#42;)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#ifndef LLVM&#95;TRANSFORMS&#95;SCALAR&#95;CONSTANTHOISTING&#95;H</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#define LLVM&#95;TRANSFORMS&#95;SCALAR&#95;CONSTANTHOISTING&#95;H</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/arrayref-h">llvm/ADT/ArrayRef.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/densemap-h">llvm/ADT/DenseMap.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/mapvector-h">llvm/ADT/MapVector.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/pointerunion-h">llvm/ADT/PointerUnion.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/setvector-h">llvm/ADT/SetVector.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/smallvector-h">llvm/ADT/SmallVector.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/basicblock-h">llvm/IR/BasicBlock.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/passmanager-h">llvm/IR/PassManager.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &lt;algorithm&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &lt;vector&gt;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a>;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo">TargetTransformInfo</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo">TargetTransformInfo</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// A private &quot;module&quot; namespace for types and utilities used by</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Add the user to the use list and update the cost.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/consthoist/constantcandidate/#a4fdea98c3806762ce3f0859c39eb5eec"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/consthoist/constantcandidate/#a4fdea98c3806762ce3f0859c39eb5eec">addUser</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;Inst, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Idx, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/consthoist/constantcandidate/#a454d85dc633ed77e26b02ade38cc239a">CumulativeCost</a> += <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/consthoist/constantcandidate/#a0d577abeb4258e39759279e94b504c7a">Uses</a>.push&#95;back(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/consthoist/constantuser">ConstantUser</a>(Inst, Idx));</span></CodeLine>
